name: AlgebraicGeometry.locallyOfFinitePresentation_iff
initialProofState:
X Y : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
⊢ Iff (AlgebraicGeometry.LocallyOfFinitePresentation f) (∀ (U : ↑Y.affineOpens) (V : ↑X.affineOpens) (e : LE.le (↑V) ((TopologicalSpace.Opens.map f.base).obj ↑U)), (CommRingCat.Hom.hom (AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.appLE f (↑U) (↑V) e)).FinitePresentation)
decl:
/-- A morphism of schemes `f : X ⟶ Y` is locally of finite presentation if for each affine `U ⊆ Y`
and `V ⊆ f ⁻¹' U`, The induced map `Γ(Y, U) ⟶ Γ(X, V)` is of finite presentation. -/
@[mk_iff]
class LocallyOfFinitePresentation : Prop where
  finitePresentation_of_affine_subset :
    ∀ (U : Y.affineOpens) (V : X.affineOpens) (e : V.1 ≤ f ⁻¹ᵁ U.1),
      (f.appLE U V e).hom.FinitePresentation

initialProofState:

⊢ (CommRingCat.Hom.hom (AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.appLE f (↑U) (↑V) e)).FinitePresentation
decl:

@[mk_iff]
class LocallyOfFinitePresentation : Prop where
  finitePresentation_of_affine_subset :

name: AlgebraicGeometry.locallyOfFinitePresentation_comp
initialProofState:
X Y Z : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
g : Quiver.Hom Y Z
hf : AlgebraicGeometry.LocallyOfFinitePresentation f
hg : AlgebraicGeometry.LocallyOfFinitePresentation g
⊢ AlgebraicGeometry.LocallyOfFinitePresentation (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f g)
decl:
instance locallyOfFinitePresentation_comp {X Y Z : Scheme.{u}} (f : X ⟶ Y) (g : Y ⟶ Z)
    [hf : LocallyOfFinitePresentation f] [hg : LocallyOfFinitePresentation g] :
    LocallyOfFinitePresentation (f ≫ g) :=
  MorphismProperty.comp_mem _ f g hf hg
